findings.liver: Diffusely echogenic with a smooth contour; no focal liver mass; main portal vein patent with hepatopetal flow; no ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CHD measures 4 mm.
findings.gallbladder: Cholelithiasis without gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid.
findings.pancreas: Not well visualized, largely obscured by overlying bowel gas.
findings.kidneys: Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis.
findings.retroperitoneum: Aorta not well visualized due to overlying bowel gas and poor penetration.
